title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Newberry National Volcanic Monument, Oregon
content:
Photo submitted by Alan Petrie, “This is a view of Paulina Lake from the Crater Rim Trail during our ‘last day of summer’ ride. This is located south of Bend, OR, in the Newberry National Volcanic Monument.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Newberry National Volcanic Monument, Oregon appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
